project_plan.name: Command-Line Temperature Converter Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool in Python that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement Functionality to Convert Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement Functionality to Convert Celsius to Kelvin
Implement Functionality to Convert Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement Functionality to Convert Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement Functionality to Convert Kelvin to Celsius
Implement Functionality to Convert Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Create Command-Line Interface for User Input
Write tests for each of the conversion functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
